DOC.brief_summary: This prospective cohort study . The investigator enroll 50 healthy volunteer . In safe environment signing inform consent , participant consume standardize alcoholic beverage . Using Breathalyzer , subject BAT measure . If subject 's BAT le 0.10 +/- 0.005 , subject drink another alcoholic beverage . This process continue subject 's BAT 0.10 +/- 0.005 . The number alcoholic beverage subject consumes monitor observer . When target BAT reach , subject manipulate breathalyzer various way measure BAT manipulation . In set order , subject manipulate breathalyzer use less subject 's maximal exhalation effort , place breathalyzer side subject 's mouth , hyperventilate ( 10 rapidly ( less 1 second ) successive breath prior use device ) , repeat breathalyzer 5 minute 10 minute hyperventilation drink cold water breathalyzer 10 minute repeat breathalyzer drink cold water . DOC.brief_title: Manipulation Breath Alcohol Tests : Can Specific Techniques Alter Blood Alcohol Concentration Readings ?
